description:
It`s been a month since the idol festival and the 346 Production Cinderella Project idols are expanding the scope of their activities and grow one step at a time. It`s smooth sailing for P until a suspicious figure seems to follow him wherever he goes. Do
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Who Is the Lady in the Castle?
